title: House of the Dragon S1E02 Q&A livestream
description:
Original livestream video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b5naDKw_Gzo

Weekly livestreams every Sunday at ~10:15pm Eastern Time, right after each episode of HOTD. Then an Explained video later in the week, summarising and analysing each episode.

Get a free audiobook with an Audible trial: http://www.audible.com/asx

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCveZqqGewoyPiacooywP5Ig?sub_confirmation=1

Support on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/AltShiftX

Twitter: https://twitter.com/altshiftx

Merch: https://standard.tv/altshiftx

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
